subject: CNC Machine spindle bearing replacement needed
description: The spindle bearing is showing signs of wear and increased vibration. Recommend immediate replacement to prevent further damage.

subject: Hydraulic press pressure gauge malfunction
description: Pressure gauge is not reading correctly. Equipment may be running at unsafe pressures. Requires immediate inspection and repair.

subject: Motor assembly routine maintenance
description: Scheduled preventive maintenance for the electric motor assembly. Oil change, filter replacement, and thermal inspection required.

subject: Conveyor belt torn and damaged
description: The conveyor belt has a significant tear spanning 30cm. Equipment is currently out of service. Replacement or major repair needed.

subject: Lathe coolant system maintenance
description: Annual coolant system flush and filter replacement for the precision lathe. System is functioning normally but preventive maintenance due.
